item.title: A note on Cardano's formula
item.description: arXiv:2403.04774v4 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this paper we show that Cardanos formula for the solution of cubic equations can be reduced to expressions involving only square roots if the real root is rational.
item.dc:creator: Dietmar Pfeifer

item.title: New Generalizations of Morrie's Law and the Euler Product Formula
item.description: arXiv:2403.09698v2 Announce Type: replace Abstract: In this study, we derive the infinite product representation of the $\operatorname{sinc}(\mathrm{z})$ function by expressing it in a trigonometric form, evoking similarities to Morrie's Law and Euler's Product formula, along with their generalizations. The results presented in this investigation are entirely novel and are believed to introduce new insights into the topic.
item.dc:creator: Carlos A. P\'erez Aparicio
